subject: Job offer acceptance
content:
Hey Dill,

I've just received your job offer email, and I'm 100% going to accept!

It's been a pleasure learning more about the role and the organization, and I'm convinced it's the ideal opportunity for me.

You can consider this email a formal acceptance. Please outline the next steps in the process. I can provide any documents, references, or information you need.

If you need to contact me, you can message me anytime. If you spot me in the street, I'll be the one with a big smile on my face!

I can't wait to start working with you and making a difference.
Tom

subject: Lunch invite!
content:
Hey all!

It's about time we organized a social event, and I'm going to do it!

I've done some research, gone through shared calendars, and identified a date, time, and venue that should work for us all (details below!).

Date
Time
Venue
Can you let me know if you would like to attend? Drop me an email with a yes or no, and I'll confirm the numbers and make a booking.

I can't wait to see you.
Tom
